> [nofish](#comment_152_2): When you create a new vote, you update/sign your data file then publish it to 5 random peers. When a peer got a new and valid file he/she publishes to 5 other random peers. Its simple, but has many unnecessary communication, if anyone know better solution please let me know :)

It would take some work to implement, but you may be interested in checking out the work of Wolinsky et al on collective authorities: http://arxiv.org/pdf/1503.08768v1.pdf

I can think of quite a few positive implications a cothority scheme would have for ZeroNet, especially considering your efforts in implementing ZeroID.
